trans-unit.source: Provides data for workflow events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para eventos de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Workflow events are associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de fluxo de trabalho são associados uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contém o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associado ao evento de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> or an object that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> class provides the data for all of the workflow events in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> ou um objeto que deriva de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> classe fornece os dados para todos os eventos de fluxo de trabalho no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> is the base class for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> é a classe base para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> object using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> property when an event handler method is called.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como obter um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> objeto usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> propriedade quando um método de manipulador de eventos é chamado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> evento ocorrer, o `OnWorkflowIdled` definido neste exemplo de método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: It determines which workflow is idled using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Determina qual fluxo de trabalho está ocioso usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> propriedade e, em seguida, obtém uma coleção de itens em fila para o fluxo de trabalho de instância ao chamar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O código itera pela coleção para determinar qual atividade está aguardando o evento que ociosos o fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> method along with the name of the event queue item.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, envia uma exceção para a fila de fluxo de trabalho usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> método junto com o nome do item da fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de cancelar uma amostra do SDK do fluxo de trabalho do arquivo Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Cancelando um fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb).

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow instance associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância de fluxo de trabalho associada ao evento de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> associado ao evento de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> object using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> property when an event handler method is called.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como obter um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> objeto usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> propriedade quando um método de manipulador de eventos é chamado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> evento ocorrer, o `OnWorkflowIdled` definido neste exemplo de método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: It determines which workflow is idled using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Determina qual fluxo de trabalho está ocioso usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> propriedade e, em seguida, obtém uma coleção de itens em fila para o fluxo de trabalho de instância ao chamar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O código itera pela coleção para determinar qual atividade está aguardando o evento que ociosos o fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> method along with the name of the event queue item.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, envia uma exceção para a fila de fluxo de trabalho usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> método junto com o nome do item da fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de cancelar uma amostra do SDK do fluxo de trabalho do arquivo Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Cancelando um fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb).
